title: What would be your dream BTS collaboration in 2020? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: BTS X BLACKPINK   My one and only dream collaboration! They both are my all time favorite bands….I think it will be a legendary collaboration if both of the groups really collaborate. They both create such amazing music….just imagine our one and only savage rapper Jendueki rapping along with Yoongi, the cold rapper with swag and RM the rapper who spits fire🔥 And Jisoo and Rosé singing with the king of high notes, our mochi Jimin, our Mom Jinnie, TaeTae and our golden Kookie, Jungkook. Lisa and Jhope, the dance machines of their groups having dance breaks together and setting the stage on fire🔥 I really want this to come true. With their MV breaking records in Youtube and creating history in KPOP. But sadly I don't think this will come true because of YG and some other stuff. But if this comes TRUE RIP MEE!!!

Okay, so BTS could collaborate with just about anyone and make the song a masterpiece. That’s my opinion. Now, about who I want them to collaborate with? There’s a few. RAP LINE AND 3RACHA This is BTS’ RAP LINE:  And this is Stray Kids’ 3RACHA:  They’d make an awesome collab. The next one is : BTS and Stray Kids This is BTS:  and this is Stray Kids  Note that these pictures are not mine. Credits to the rightful owners of the pictures. BigHit and JYP. And the other owners.
